name: CreateUserStatusUpdateNotificationRule
description:
Create a new status update notification rule for a user.

This tool allows you to create a new status update notification rule for a user in a PagerDuty account. It should be called when you need to set up or modify how a user is notified about status updates. Requires 'users.write' permission.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user resource for creating the notification rule.

parameters.name: accept_header_version
parameters.description: The versioning header to specify the API version for the request. Typically in the format 'application/vnd.pagerduty+json;version=2'.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the content type of the request body. Must be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: status_update_notification_rule
parameters.description: JSON payload defining the status update notification rule, including contact methods and other settings.

status_update_notification_rule.description: A rule for contacting the user for Incident Status Updates.

value_schema.description: The status update notification rule to be created.
